MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G76 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Busby and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm due to a fault on our underground network at 1 Riverside Lane, and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at5:45pm on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
